name: in_control=!in_control
description:
Controls

movement: A,W,S,D and arrow keys

change character: Shift key

telekinesis: Space keys + movement

restart level: R

Move rooms with "Vertical Boy": ARROW UP / ARROW DOWN /  W / S

Move rooms with "Horizontal Boy":  ARROW LEFT / ARROW RIGHT /  A / D

Use SPACE KEYS + ARROW LEFT / ARROW RIGHT or ARROW UP / ARROW DOWN to use telekinesis

Bring together both characters to the portal

Known Issues

For now if you face one of these bugs you could restart the level. Sorry.

  1. Sometimes character does not recover focus after using telekinesis;
  2. Sometimes after use telekinesis you get control of both characters;
  3. Lacking of some visual and auditive feedbacks.
